programme.title: The Cinema List: True Stories
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, News And Current Affairs ║ 2024

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Riko and best friend Kane bungle the robbery of a local bank, causing one of the customers, hard man Leo Demarco, to suffer a heart attack. Fake news spreads that Leo is dead and Shotti, leader of one of East London's toughest firms, recruits Riko and Kane in gratitude for killing a rival.
